title: Never Sleep with Strangers
description: "She almost looked as if she slept, except...The trident had pierced through her. And the snow-white gown was turning ever more crimson."Four years ago, while vacationing at their country estate in Scotland, Jon Stuart watched his wife plummet from the balcony to a horrific death. Although cleared of any involvement, he's endured years of public suspicion -- losing friends and his good standing in the community. But this was no accident, and now he's determined to prove it was murder.Orchestrating a dangerous plan, Jon has gathered the prime suspects at the scene of the crime. The stage is set as past and present collide, old lovers reunite... and a killer plots another perfect crime.
author: Heather Graham Pozzessere
